relation: Causes the LIST command to list subscribed mailboxes, rather than the actual mailboxes.
Causes the LIST command to return remote mailboxes as well as local ones, as described in RFC 2193.
Causes the LIST command to return subscription state.
Requests that CHILDINFO extended data item (childinfo-extended-item) is to be returned.
Causes the LIST response to include mailboxes that mandate the UTF8 SELECT/EXAMINE parameter.
Causes the LIST response to include mailboxes that mandate the UTF8 SELECT/EXAMINE parameter and exclude mailboxes that do not support the UTF8 SELECT/EXAMINE parameter.
Causes the LIST response to include \NoUTF8 and \UTF8Only mailbox attributes.
Causes the LIST command to return STATUS responses in addition to LIST responses.
Limit the list to special-use mailboxes only
Person and email address to contact for further information
see Authors' Addresses at the end of [RFC5738]

textAfterTable: LIST-EXTENDED response Registration Procedure(s) IANA approval template in [RFC5258] section 9.3 Reference [ RFC5258] Available Formats CSV LIST-EXTENDED extended data item tag LIST-EXTENDED extended data item description Which LIST-EXTENDED option(s) (and their types) causes this extended data item to be returned (if any) Published specification Security considerations Intended usage Person and email address to contact for further information Owner/Change controller CHILDINFO The CHILDINFO extended data item describes the selection criteria that has caused it to be returned and indicates that the mailbox has one or more child mailboxes that match the selection criteria. RECURSIVEMATCH selection option [RFC5258], Section 3.5. [RFC5258], Section 8. COMMON [Alexey_Melnikov] [IESG] OLDNAME The OLDNAME extended data item describes the old mailbox name for the mailbox identified by the LIST response. none [RFC5465], Section 5.4.
